channel.title: Viewscream (various scenarios)
channel.description:
![viewscream%20(1)|500x500](upload://cXPhKcn3Ww7fpwYFbvAuHu3ymZw.jpeg)
In September, we will hold a couple sessions of Rafael Chandler’s *Viewscream* (2013), a VARP (Video-Augmented Roleplaying game) specifically designed to be played through video chat. The entire game is played in-character, and scenarios tend to veer towards tales of treachery, paranoia, and horror.
Each session will be three hours, which should allow us to play through one or two scenarios. I will review the rules at the start of both sessions, and the sessions will involve different scenarios, so you can attend both sessions or choose one or the other, whatever suits your fancy and your schedule.
You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. Rules will be taught. Sessions will be recorded.
We will have a pregame discussion of lines and veils as well as employ the X-card during sessions. We will observe the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html
